analysis.description:
VGWToken.checkPermissions (/unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol#323-344) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp < unlockTimeF2) && (_address == adrFounder2) (/unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol#335-343)
	- (block.timestamp < unlockTimeF1) && (_address == adrFounder1) (/unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol#328-343)
	- (_address == adrInvestor || _address == adrDevTeam) && (block.timestamp < ITSEndTime) (/unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol#324-343)
	- block.timestamp < ITSEndTime (/unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol#341-343)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/7/0x94236591125e935f5ac128bb3d5062944c24958c.sol#1): it allows old versions
